channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-8242] Unable to start HBase 0.95.0RC0 out of the box because of ZK trying to access /var/folders/
item.description:
HBase 0.95.0RC0 is failing out of the box because of some ZooKeeper exceptions to write in /var/folders/

jmspaggi@virtual:~/hbase-0.95.0-hadoop1$ bin/start-hbase.sh
jmspaggi@virtual:~/hbase-0.95.0-hadoop1$ tail -100f logs/hbase-jmspaggi-master-virtual.log

item.summary: Unable to start HBase 0.95.0RC0 out of the box because of ZK trying to access /var/folders/

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Remove interpolation during resource copy. Add back an antrun removed sometime during the module-making.

J-D tested a jar made w/ this patch in place so going to commit and put up new RC....
Committed to 0.95 and trunk. Let me put up a new RC.
Thanks Stack. If the RC is out before 18PST, I will give it a try today.

Integrated in hbase-0.95 #120 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/hbase-0.95/120/)
